heading: HR01689
0: RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE PERENNIAL ISSUE OF SUPPLY, PROCUREMENT AND IMPORTATION OF RICE, THE DISTORTION OF THE MARKET SITUATION BY SOME SO-CALLED "UNSCRUPULOUS PARTIES" AND THE EXISTENCE OF RICE CARTELS, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ENSURING FOOD SECURITY AND GOVERNMENT SUPPORT TO FILIPINO RICE FARMERS AS THE MAIN PRODUCERS AND SOURCE OF OUR STAPLE FOOD
status: Pending with the Committee on AGRICULTURE AND FOOD since 2018-02-28
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR01689
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION DIRECTING THE COMMITTEE ON AGRICULTURE TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE PERENNIAL ISSUE OF SUPPLY, PROCUREMENT AND IMPORTATION OF RICE, THE DISTORTION OF THE MARKET SITUATION BY SOME SO-CALLED "UNSCRUPULOUS PARTIES" AND THE EXISTENCE OF RICE CARTELS, WITH THE END IN VIEW OF ENSURING FOOD SECURITY AND GOVERNMENT SUPPORT TO FILIPINO RICE FARMERS AS THE MAIN PRODUCERS AND SOURCE OF OUR STAPLE FOOD
